System.description: When checked, it will never resume the game and always start the default interface at boot.

System.short_description: Shutdown on power button single press
System.description:
When checked, the console is powered off with a single press on power button.
When unchecked, signle press triggers standby mode.
When checked, the vibration of the Menu button will be disabled.

System.short_description: Disable auto save on low battery.
System.description: If enabled, the console will not auto save and quit on low battery.
If enabled logs will be dumped into .tmp_update/logs

If you're not behind a VPN.

When checked, you have to set manually the time zone in Onion Tools app (on the console).
If you're not behind a VPN, we recommend to disable it to sync your time zone on your MMP thanks to an http API.

Network.description:
Your Miyoo Mini Plus just got a lot more portable. SSH/Telnet, HTTP fileserver, FTP on the go, no extra devices needed.
Stay connected with ease, anytime, anywhere. Compatible with netplay (best paired with Easy Netplay).
There are reports of issues with hotspot on firmware levels below 0505.

The Samba (SMB) is a file sharing protocol that provides integrated sharing of files
and directories between your Miyoo Mini plus and your PC (Windows/Unix/Linux).
It enables easy access, allowing you to share, access, and modify files as
if they were stored locally on your PC.

Based on filebrowser. When enabled a web server will be hosted on your mini.
 You can connect on it from your computer by typing http://ip_of_your_mini. 
It allows to copy files and folder and is very handy for devs as a script editor is integrated.
However HTTP filebrowser use a lot of memory so think about disabling it
when you don't use it or when you run demanding games.
For a long transfert with many files you'll prefer FTP or SSH server.

Much like the HTTP server, FTP provides a method of transferring files between
your Miyoo Mini+ and other devices such as a PC/Phone/Tablet.
You'll need an FTP client installed on the second device.

SSH provides a secure command line method to communicate with your Miyoo Mini+.
SFTP provides a secure file transfer method
Telnet provides an unencrypted command line method to communicate with your Miyoo Mini+.
